title: Virtual Assistant for Lead Generation, Outreach, and Follow-ups
job_overview:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant for Manual Lead Generation, Outreach & Follow-Ups (Full-Time)
Company: GrowMedSpas

About Us:
GrowMedSpas is a digital agency dedicated to helping medical spas in the United States improve their online presence, attract more clients, and streamline their operations. We’re a small but fast-growing team, and we're looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join us full-time.

Job Overview:
We are hiring a full-time Virtual Assistant who will focus on manual lead generation, outreach, and follow-ups. This role requires strong attention to detail, the ability to research and gather information online, and good communication skills for reaching out to prospects.

Key Responsibilities:

Research and identify medspa leads in the U.S. using online directories, social media, and search engines

Collect and fill in specific lead information (e.g., names, emails, business details) into spreadsheets or CRM

Send outreach emails or messages (we’ll provide templates and guidance)

Follow up with leads regularly and update their status

Assist with general VA tasks as needed (light admin work, organizing files, etc.)

Requirements:

Excellent written English

Comfortable using tools like Google Sheets, Gmail, and basic CRM systems

Reliable internet connection

High attention to detail

Self-motivated and able to work independently

Willing to learn and follow clear processes

Preferred (but not required):

Experience with lead generation or outreach

Familiarity with U.S. businesses or medspa industry

Prior experience working with an agency or in a remote VA role

Working Hours:

Full-time — ideally with at least 3–4 hours overlap with U.S. business hours (Eastern or Pacific Time preferred)

Monday to Friday

Salary & Benefits:

Competitive monthly salary (to be discussed)

Long-term opportunity with growth potential

Supportive and flexible work environment

Training and tools provided

If you're a fast learner, proactive, and love helping businesses grow, we'd love to hear from you!
